title: (x) websites that use Avenir - various {gang}
content: Can you name some websites which use the font, Avenir (any weight) for their logos, main headings. etc.
author: anonymous

comments.content:
\<font class="dontLookLikeCrap"\>Amsterdam (as in 'Skunk capital of the World') uses Avenir in their Identity Program. The official site ( [www.amsterdam.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20120219231017/http:/www.amsterdam.nl/)) shows Avenir in buttons and other artwork.   
Be warned: The site did NOT really work well on my system (OS X 10.3.5) with both Safari and Explorer...\</font\>
